The '''African-American Film Critics Association Awards 2007''', honoring the best in filmmaking of [[2007 in film|2007]], were given on December 17, 2007. ==Top 10 Films== # ''[[The Great Debaters]]'' # ''[[American Gangster (film)|American Gangster]]'' # ''[[Talk to Me (2007 film)|Talk to Me]]'' # ''[[Gone Baby Gone]]'' # ''[[No Country for Old Men (film)|No Country for Old Men]]'' # ''[[Michael Clayton (film)|Michael Clayton]]'' # ''[[Juno (film)|Juno]]'' # ''[[Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007 film)|Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street]]'' # ''[[Things We Lost in the Fire]]'' # ''[[There Will Be Blood]]'' ==Winners== *Best Actor: **[[Don Cheadle]] - ''[[Talk to Me (2007 film)|Talk to Me]]'' *Best Actress: **[[Marion Cotillard]] - ''[[La Vie en rose (film)|La Vie en rose]]'' *Best Director: **[[Kasi Lemmons]] - ''[[Talk to Me (2007 film)|Talk to Me]]'' *Best Picture: **''[[The Great Debaters]]'' *Best Supporting Actor: **[[Chiwetel Ejiofor]] - ''[[Talk to Me (2007 film)|Talk to Me]]'' *Best Supporting Actress: **[[Ruby Dee]] - ''[[American Gangster (film)|American Gangster]]'' ==References== *http://www.blackfilm.com/20071214/features/aafca.shtml *http://newsblaze.com/story/20071217183258tsop.nb/topstory.html * * {{AAFCA Awards chron}} [[Category:2007 film awards]]
